wepy.page.body:
<!-- $0 -->
<template>
  <view class='container'></view>
</template>

<script>
  import wepy from 'wepy';
  export default class Example extends wepy.page {
    config = {
      navigationBarTitleText: "",
    };

    data = {};

    components = {};

    methods = {};

    events = {};

    watch = {};

    computed = {};

    onLoad() { };

    onShow() { };
  }
</script>

<style lang='scss'>
</style>

wepy.component.body:
<!-- $0 -->
<template>
  <view class='container'></view>
</template>

<script>
  import wepy from 'wepy';
  export default class Example extends wepy.component {
    props = {};

    data = {};

    components = {};

    methods = {};

    events = {};

    watch = {};

    computed = {};

    onLoad() { };

    onShow() { };
  }
</script>

<style lang='scss'>
</style>

wepy.scroll-view.all.body:
<scroll-view scroll-x scroll-y scroll-with-animation upper-threshold="50" lower-threshold="50" scroll-top="$1" scroll-left="$2"
  @scrolltoupper="$3" @scrolltolower="$4" @scroll="$5">
  $6
</scroll-view>

wepy.swiper.body:
<swiper indicator-dots autoplay circular>
    <block wx:for="{{${1:items}}}" wx:key="">
        <swiper-item>
            <image mode="${2:aspectFill}" src="{{${3:item}.src}}"></image>
        </swiper-item>
    </block>
</swiper>

wepy.icon.body:
<icon type="${1| success, success_no_circle, info, warn, waiting, cancel, download, search, clear|}" size="${2:24}">
</icon>

wepy.form.button.contact.card.description: 表单.打开客服会话 显示消息卡片
wepy.form.button.contact.card.body:
<button size="${1|defult,mini|}" type="${2|defult,primary,warn|}" form-type="${3|submit,reset|}" disabled="${4|false,true|}"
  open-type="contact" show-message-card="true" session-from="${5:微信小程序}" send-message-title="${6:标题}" send-message-path="${7:分享路径}"
  send-message-img="${8: 会话内容消息卡片图片}" @contact="contact">
  $9
</button>

wepy.form.button.getUserInfo.description: 表单.获取用户信息,可以从bindgetuserinfo回调中获取到用户信息
wepy.form.button.getUserInfo.body:
<button size="${1|defult,mini|}" type="${2|defult,primary,warn|}" form-type="${3|submit,reset|}" disabled="${4|false,true|}"
  open-type="getUserInfo" @getuserinfo="getUserInfo" lang="${5|zh_CN,zh_TW,en|}">
  $6
</button>

wepy.form.button.getPhoneNumber.description: 表单.获取用户手机号,可以从bindgetphonenumber回调中获取到用户信息

wepy.form.button.launchApp.description: 表单.打开APP,可以通过app-parameter属性设定向APP传的参数
wepy.form.button.launchApp.body:
<button size="${1|defult,mini|}" type="${2|defult,primary,warn|}" form-type="${3|submit,reset|}" disabled="${4|false,true|}"
  open-type="launchApp" app-parameter="$5">
  $6
</button>

wepy.form.input.body:
<input value="$1" type="${2|text,number,idcard,digit|}" password="${3:false}" placeholder="${4:占位符}" placeholder-class="${5:placeholder}"
  maxlength="140" @blur="$6"> $7
</input>

wepy.form.picker.selector.body:
<picker @change="bindPickerChange" value="{{${1:index}}}" range="{{${2:array}}}">
  <view class="picker">
    当前选择：{{${2:array}[${1:index}]}}
  </view>
</picker>

wepy.form.picker.multiSelector.body:
<picker mode="multiSelector" @change="bindMultiPickerChange" value="{{${1:index}}}" range="{{${2:array}}}">
  <view class="picker">
    当前选择：{{${2:array}[0][${1:index}[0]]}},{{${2:array}[1][${1:index}[1]]}},{{${2:array}[2][${1:index}[2]]}}
  </view>
</picker>

wepy.form.picker.time.body:
<picker mode="time" @change="bindPickerChange" value="{{${1:time}}}" start="08:30" end="12:00">
  <view class="picker">
    当前选择：{{${1:time}}}
  </view>
</picker>

wepy.form.picker.date.body:
<picker mode="date" @change="bindPickerChange" value="{{${1:date}}}" start="2015-09-0" end="2017-09-01">
  <view class="picker">
    当前选择：{{${1:date}}}
  </view>
</picker>

wepy.form.picker.region.description: 表单.选择器.省市区选择

wepy.form.picker-view.description: 表单.嵌入页面的滚动选择器

wepy.image.body:
<image src="{{$1}}" mode="${2|scaleToFill,aspectFit,aspectFill,widthFix,top,bottom,center,left,right,top left,top right,bottom left,bottom right|}"
  lazy-load="${3:false}">
</image>
